entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , North Perth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:20 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.2°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
